entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Hardy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hardy Airport 1:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 40 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -12.6°C
Wind: E 39 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except northeast 60 gusting to 80 through mainland inlets and valleys. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except northeast 40 gusting to 60 through mainland inlets and valleys this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
